intents.description: An Intent to get information from Watson Discovery

examples.text: Good morning
Greetings
Hello
Hi
Howdy
I need lights
Lock the doors
Arm the security system
Start recording
headlights
Turn on the lights

values: Sorry I haven't learned answers to questions like this.
That question is out of scope for this application, take a look at the Conversation Enhanced application to handle questions like these.
I'm sorry, I don't know how to do that. I can turn on lights, cameras, or security systems.
OK! Which light would you like to turn on?
I'm sorry, I can't help with that. For additional help, please call 555-2368.
I'm sorry, I can only turn on vehicle lights.
Hi! What can I do for you?
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
